children.description:
This prop isn't supported.
Use the `component` prop if you need to change the children structure.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

showLabel.description:
If `true`, the `BottomNavigationAction` will show its label.
By default, only the selected `BottomNavigationAction`
inside `BottomNavigation` will show its label.

value.description: You can provide your own value. Otherwise, we fallback to the child position index.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.selected: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if selected.
descriptions.iconOnly: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `showLabel={false}` and not selected.
descriptions.wrapper: Styles applied to the span element that wraps the icon and label.
descriptions.label: Styles applied to the label's span element.
